Evince
Evince is a document viewer capable of displaying multiple and single page document formats like PDF and Postscript.
  • Main Page
  • Related Pages
  • Data Structures
  • Files
  • File List
  • Globals
 All Data Structures Files Functions Variables Typedefs Enumerations Enumerator Macros Pages

gint _ev_view_get_caret_cursor_offset_at_doc_point ( EvView *  view,
gint  page,
gdouble  doc_x,
gdouble  doc_y 
)

Definition at line 4615 of file ev-view.c.

4619 {
4620  EvRectangle *areas = NULL;
4621  guint n_areas = 0;
4622  gint offset = -1;
4623  gint first_line_offset;
4624  gint last_line_offset = -1;
4625  EvRectangle *rect;
4626  guint i;
4627 
4628  ev_page_cache_get_text_layout (view->page_cache, page, &areas, &n_areas);
4629  if (!areas)
4630  return -1;
4631 
4632  i = 0;
4633  while (i < n_areas && offset == -1) {
4634  rect = areas + i;
4635 
4636  first_line_offset = -1;
4637  while (doc_y >= rect->y1 && doc_y <= rect->y2) {
4638  if (first_line_offset == -1) {
4639  if (doc_x <= rect->x1) {
4640  /* Location is before the start of the line */
4641  if (last_line_offset != -1) {
4642  EvRectangle *last = areas + last_line_offset;
4643  gint dx1, dx2;
4644 
4645  /* If there's a previous line, check distances */
4646 
4647  dx1 = doc_x - last->x2;
4648  dx2 = rect->x1 - doc_x;
4649 
4650  if (dx1 < dx2)
4651  offset = last_line_offset;
4652  else
4653  offset = i;
4654  } else {
4655  offset = i;
4656  }
4657 
4658  last_line_offset = i + 1;
4659  break;
4660  }
4661  first_line_offset = i;
4662  }
4663  last_line_offset = i + 1;
4664 
4665  if (doc_x >= rect->x1 && doc_x <= rect->x2) {
4666  /* Location is inside the line. Position the caret before
4667  * or after the character, depending on whether the point
4668  * falls within the left or right half of the bounding box.
4669  */
4670  if (doc_x <= rect->x1 + (rect->x2 - rect->x1) / 2)
4671  offset = i;
4672  else
4673  offset = i + 1;
4674  break;
4675  }
4676 
4677  i++;
4678  rect = areas + i;
4679  }
4680 
4681  if (first_line_offset == -1)
4682  i++;
4683  }
4684 
4685  if (last_line_offset == -1)
4686  return -1;
4687 
4688  if (offset == -1)
4689  offset = last_line_offset;
4690 
4691  return offset;
4692 }

1365  GdkRectangle page_area;
1366  GtkBorder border;
1367  double x, y, view_x, view_y;
1368 
1369  switch (view->rotation) {
1370  case 0:
1371  x = doc_point->x;
1372  y = doc_point->y;
1373 
1374  break;
1375  case 90: {
1376  gdouble width;
1377 
1378  get_doc_page_size (view, page, &width, NULL);
1379  x = width - doc_point->y;
1380  y = doc_point->x;
1381  }

1383  case 180: {
1384  gdouble width, height;
1385

1388  y = height - doc_point->y;

1393

1395  x = doc_point->y;
1396  y = height - doc_point->x;
1397  }
1398  break;

1400  g_assert_not_reached ();

1406  view_y = CLAMP ((gint)(y * view->scale + 0.5), 0, page_area.height);
1407  view_point->x = view_x + page_area.x + border.left;
1408  view_point->y = view_y + page_area.y + border.top;
1409 }

gint  rotation,

)

1149

1153  height = (gint)(h * scale + 0.5);

static gboolean blink_cb ( EvView *  view)
static

Definition at line 3507 of file ev-view.c.

3508 {
3509  gint blink_timeout;
3510  guint blink_time;
3511 
3512  blink_timeout = get_cursor_blink_timeout_id (view);
3513  if (view->cursor_blink_time > 1000 * blink_timeout && blink_timeout < G_MAXINT / 1000) {
3514  /* We've blinked enough without the user doing anything, stop blinking */
3515  show_cursor (view);
3516  view->cursor_blink_timeout_id = 0;
3517 
3518  return FALSE;
3519  }
3520 
3521  blink_time = get_cursor_blink_time (view);
3522  if (view->cursor_visible) {
3523  hide_cursor (view);
3524  blink_time *= CURSOR_OFF_MULTIPLIER;
3525  } else {
3526  show_cursor (view);
3527  view->cursor_blink_time += blink_time;
3528  blink_time *= CURSOR_ON_MULTIPLIER;
3529  }
3530 
3531  view->cursor_blink_timeout_id = gdk_threads_add_timeout (blink_time / CURSOR_DIVIDER, (GSourceFunc)blink_cb, view);
3532 
3533  return FALSE;
3534 }

static GList* compute_new_selection ( EvView *  view,
EvSelectionStyle  style,
GdkPoint *  start,
GdkPoint *  stop 
)
static

Definition at line 8446 of file ev-view.c.

8450 {
8451  int i, first, last;
8452  GList *list = NULL;
8453 
8454  /* First figure out the range of pages the selection affects. */
8455  if (!get_selection_page_range (view, style, start, stop, &first, &last))
8456  return list;
8457 
8458  /* Now create a list of EvViewSelection's for the affected
8459  * pages. This could be an empty list, a list of just one
8460  * page or a number of pages.*/
8461  for (i = first; i <= last; i++) {
8462  EvViewSelection *selection;
8463  GdkRectangle page_area;
8464  GtkBorder border;
8465  GdkPoint *point;
8466  gdouble width, height;
8467 
8468  get_doc_page_size (view, i, &width, &height);
8469 
8470  selection = g_slice_new0 (EvViewSelection);
8471  selection->page = i;
8472  selection->style = style;
8473  selection->rect.x1 = selection->rect.y1 = 0;
8474  selection->rect.x2 = width;
8475  selection->rect.y2 = height;
8476 
8477  ev_view_get_page_extents (view, i, &page_area, &border);
8478  if (gdk_rectangle_point_in (&page_area, start))
8479  point = start;
8480  else
8481  point = stop;
8482 
8483  if (i == first) {
8484  _ev_view_transform_view_point_to_doc_point (view, point,
8485  &page_area, &border,
8486  &selection->rect.x1,
8487  &selection->rect.y1);
8488  }
8489 
8490  /* If the selection is contained within just one page,
8491  * make sure we don't write 'start' into both points
8492  * in selection->rect. */
8493  if (first == last)
8494  point = stop;
8495 
8496  if (i == last) {
8497  _ev_view_transform_view_point_to_doc_point (view, point,
8498  &page_area, &border,
8499  &selection->rect.x2,
8500  &selection->rect.y2);
8501  }
8502 
8503  list = g_list_prepend (list, selection);
8504  }
8505 
8506  return g_list_reverse (list);
8507 }

static gdouble compute_scroll_increment ( EvView *  view,
GtkScrollType  scroll 
)
static

Definition at line 862 of file ev-view.c.

864 {
865  GtkWidget *widget = GTK_WIDGET (view);
866  GtkAdjustment *adjustment = view->vadjustment;
867  cairo_region_t *text_region, *region;
868  GtkAllocation allocation;
869  gint page;
870  GdkRectangle rect;
871  EvRectangle doc_rect;
872  GdkRectangle page_area;
873  GtkBorder border;
874  gdouble fraction = 1.0;
875 
876  if (scroll != GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD && scroll != GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_FORWARD)
877  return gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (adjustment);
878 
879  page = scroll == GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD ? view->start_page : view->end_page;
880 
881  text_region = ev_page_cache_get_text_mapping (view->page_cache, page);
882  if (!text_region || cairo_region_is_empty (text_region))
883  return gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (adjustment);
884 
885  gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
886  ev_view_get_page_extents (view, page, &page_area, &border);
887  rect.x = page_area.x + view->scroll_x;
888  rect.y = view->scroll_y + (scroll == GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD ? 5 : allocation.height - 5);
889  rect.width = page_area.width;
890  rect.height = 1;
891  _ev_view_transform_view_rect_to_doc_rect (view, &rect, &page_area, &border, &doc_rect);
892 
893  /* Convert the doc rectangle into a GdkRectangle */
894  rect.x = doc_rect.x1;
895  rect.y = doc_rect.y1;
896  rect.width = doc_rect.x2 - doc_rect.x1;
897  rect.height = MAX (1, doc_rect.y2 - doc_rect.y1);
898  region = cairo_region_create_rectangle (&rect);
899 
900  cairo_region_intersect (region, text_region);
901  if (cairo_region_num_rectangles (region)) {
902  EvRenderContext *rc;
903  EvPage *ev_page;
904  cairo_region_t *sel_region;
905 
906  cairo_region_get_rectangle (region, 0, &rect);
907  ev_page = ev_document_get_page (view->document, page);
908  rc = ev_render_context_new (ev_page, view->rotation, 0.);
909  ev_render_context_set_target_size (rc,
910  page_area.width - (border.left + border.right),
911  page_area.height - (border.left + border.right));
912  g_object_unref (ev_page);
913  /* Get the selection region to know the height of the line */
914  doc_rect.x1 = doc_rect.x2 = rect.x + 0.5;
915  doc_rect.y1 = doc_rect.y2 = rect.y + 0.5;
916 
917  ev_document_doc_mutex_lock ();
918  sel_region = ev_selection_get_selection_region (EV_SELECTION (view->document),
919  rc, EV_SELECTION_STYLE_LINE,
920  &doc_rect);
921  ev_document_doc_mutex_unlock ();
922 
923  g_object_unref (rc);
924 
925  if (cairo_region_num_rectangles (sel_region) > 0) {
926  cairo_region_get_rectangle (sel_region, 0, &rect);
927  fraction = 1 - (rect.height / gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (adjustment));
928  }
929  cairo_region_destroy (sel_region);
930  }
931  cairo_region_destroy (region);
932 
933  return gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (adjustment) * fraction;
934 
935 }

Definition at line 5541 of file ev-view.c.

5542 {

5544  gulong n_attrs;
5545  gint i, j;
5546 
5547  if (!view->page_cache)
5548  return FALSE;

5552  return FALSE;

5554  /* Skip current word starts */

5556  if (i <= 0) {

5558  return cursor_backward_word_start (view);

5564  view->cursor_offset = MAX (0, j);

3363  view->cursor_page <= view->end_page));
3364 }

static void draw_one_page ( EvView *  view,
gint  page,
cairo_t *  cr,
GdkRectangle *  page_area,
GtkBorder *  border,
GdkRectangle *  expose_area,

)

Definition at line 6255 of file ev-view.c.

6262 {
6263  GtkStyleContext *context;
6264  GdkRectangle overlap;
6265  GdkRectangle real_page_area;
6266  gint current_page;
6267 
6268  g_assert (view->document);
6269 
6270  if (! gdk_rectangle_intersect (page_area, expose_area, &overlap))
6271  return;
6272 
6273  /* Render the document itself */
6274  real_page_area = *page_area;
6275 
6276  real_page_area.x += border->left;
6277  real_page_area.y += border->top;
6278  real_page_area.width -= (border->left + border->right);
6279  real_page_area.height -= (border->top + border->bottom);
6280  *page_ready = TRUE;
6281 
6282  context = gtk_widget_get_style_context (GTK_WIDGET (view));
6283  current_page = ev_document_model_get_page (view->model);
6284 
6285  gtk_style_context_save (context);
6286  gtk_style_context_add_class (context, EV_STYLE_CLASS_DOCUMENT_PAGE);
6287  if (ev_document_model_get_inverted_colors (view->model))
6288  gtk_style_context_add_class (context, EV_STYLE_CLASS_INVERTED);
6289 
6290  if (view->continuous && page == current_page)
6291  gtk_style_context_set_state (context, GTK_STATE_FLAG_ACTIVE);
6292 
6293  gtk_render_background (context, cr, page_area->x, page_area->y, page_area->width, page_area->height);
6294  gtk_render_frame (context, cr, page_area->x, page_area->y, page_area->width, page_area->height);
6295  gtk_style_context_restore (context);
6296 
6297  if (gdk_rectangle_intersect (&real_page_area, expose_area, &overlap)) {
6298  gint width, height;
6299  cairo_surface_t *page_surface = NULL;
6300  cairo_surface_t *selection_surface = NULL;
6301  gint offset_x, offset_y;
6302  cairo_region_t *region = NULL;
6303 
6304  page_surface = ev_pixbuf_cache_get_surface (view->pixbuf_cache, page);
6305 
6306  if (!page_surface) {
6307  if (page == current_page)
6308  ev_view_set_loading (view, TRUE);
6309 
6310  *page_ready = FALSE;
6311 
6312  return;
6313  }
6314 
6315  if (page == current_page)
6316  ev_view_set_loading (view, FALSE);
6317 
6318  ev_view_get_page_size (view, page, &width, &height);
6319  offset_x = overlap.x - real_page_area.x;
6320  offset_y = overlap.y - real_page_area.y;
6321 
6322  draw_surface (cr, page_surface, overlap.x, overlap.y, offset_x, offset_y, width, height);
6323 
6324  /* Get the selection pixbuf iff we have something to draw */
6325  if (!find_selection_for_page (view, page))
6326  return;
6327 
6328  selection_surface = ev_pixbuf_cache_get_selection_surface (view->pixbuf_cache,
6329  page,
6330  view->scale);
6331  if (selection_surface) {
6332  draw_surface (cr, selection_surface, overlap.x, overlap.y, offset_x, offset_y,
6333  width, height);
6334  return;
6335  }
6336 
6337  region = ev_pixbuf_cache_get_selection_region (view->pixbuf_cache,
6338  page,
6339  view->scale);
6340  if (region) {
6341  double scale_x, scale_y;
6342  GdkRGBA color;
6343  double device_scale_x = 1, device_scale_y = 1;
6344 
6345  scale_x = (gdouble)width / cairo_image_surface_get_width (page_surface);
6346  scale_y = (gdouble)height / cairo_image_surface_get_height (page_surface);
6347 
6348 #ifdef HAVE_HIDPI_SUPPORT
6349  cairo_surface_get_device_scale (page_surface, &device_scale_x, &device_scale_y);
6350 #endif
6351 
6352  scale_x *= device_scale_x;
6353  scale_y *= device_scale_y;
6354 
6355  _ev_view_get_selection_colors (view, &color, NULL);
6356  draw_selection_region (cr, region, &color, real_page_area.x, real_page_area.y,
6357  scale_x, scale_y);
6358  }
6359  }
6360 }

static void draw_surface ( cairo_t *  cr,
cairo_surface_t *  surface,
gint  x,
gint  y,
gint  offset_x,
gint  offset_y,
gint  target_width,

Definition at line 6173 of file ev-view.c.

6181 {
6182  gdouble width, height;
6183  gdouble device_scale_x = 1, device_scale_y = 1;
6184 
6185 #ifdef HAVE_HIDPI_SUPPORT
6186  cairo_surface_get_device_scale (surface, &device_scale_x, &device_scale_y);
6187 #endif
6188  width = cairo_image_surface_get_width (surface) / device_scale_x;
6189  height = cairo_image_surface_get_height (surface) / device_scale_y;
6190 
6191  cairo_save (cr);
6192  cairo_translate (cr, x, y);
6193 
6194  if (width != target_width || height != target_height) {
6195  gdouble scale_x, scale_y;
6196 
6197  scale_x = (gdouble)target_width / width;
6198  scale_y = (gdouble)target_height / height;
6199  cairo_pattern_set_filter (cairo_get_source (cr),
6200  CAIRO_FILTER_NEAREST);
6201  cairo_scale (cr, scale_x, scale_y);
6202 
6203  offset_x /= scale_x;
6204  offset_y /= scale_y;
6205  }

6208  offset_x * device_scale_x,
6209  offset_y * device_scale_y);

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static gboolean ev_view_autoscroll_cb ( EvView *  view)
static

Definition at line 5971 of file ev-view.c.

5972 {
5973  gdouble speed, value;
5974 
5975  /* If the user stops autoscrolling, autoscrolling will be
5976  * set to false but the timeout will continue; stop the timeout: */
5977  if (!view->scroll_info.autoscrolling) {
5978  view->scroll_info.timeout_id = 0;
5979  return FALSE;
5980  }
5981 
5982  /* Replace 100 with your speed of choice: The lower the faster.
5983  * Replace 3 with another speed of choice: The higher, the faster it accelerated
5984  * based on the distance of the starting point from the mouse
5985  * (All also effected by the timeout interval of this callback) */
5986 
5987  if (view->scroll_info.start_y > view->scroll_info.last_y)
5988  speed = -pow ((((gdouble)view->scroll_info.start_y - view->scroll_info.last_y) / 100), 3);
5989  else
5990  speed = pow ((((gdouble)view->scroll_info.last_y - view->scroll_info.start_y) / 100), 3);
5991 
5992  value = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
5993  value = CLAMP (value + speed, 0,
5994  gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) -
5995  gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment));
5996  gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->vadjustment, value);
5997 
5998  return TRUE;
5999 
6000 }

static gboolean ev_view_button_press_event ( GtkWidget *  widget,
GdkEventButton *  event 
)
static

Definition at line 4772 of file ev-view.c.

4774 {
4775  EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget);
4776 
4777  if (!view->document)
4778  return FALSE;
4779 
4780  if (gtk_gesture_is_recognized (view->zoom_gesture))
4781  return TRUE;
4782 
4783  if (!gtk_widget_has_focus (widget)) {
4784  gtk_widget_grab_focus (widget);
4785  }
4786 
4787  if (view->window_child_focus) {
4788  EvAnnotationWindow *window;
4789 
4790  window = EV_ANNOTATION_WINDOW (view->window_child_focus->window);
4791  ev_annotation_window_ungrab_focus (window);
4792  view->window_child_focus = NULL;
4793  }
4794 
4795  view->pressed_button = event->button;
4796  view->selection_info.in_drag = FALSE;
4797 
4798  if (view->adding_annot)
4799  return FALSE;
4800 
4801  if (view->scroll_info.autoscrolling)
4802  return TRUE;
4803 
4804  switch (event->button) {
4805  case 1: {
4806  EvImage *image;
4807  EvAnnotation *annot;
4808  EvFormField *field;
4809  EvMapping *link;
4810  gint page;
4811 
4812  if (event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK)
4813  return ev_view_synctex_backward_search (view, event->x , event->y);
4814 
4815  if (EV_IS_SELECTION (view->document) && view->selection_info.selections) {
4816  if (event->type == GDK_3BUTTON_PRESS) {
4817  start_selection_for_event (view, event);
4818  } else if (event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) {
4819  GdkPoint end_point;
4820 
4821  end_point.x = event->x + view->scroll_x;
4822  end_point.y = event->y + view->scroll_y;
4823  extend_selection (view, &view->selection_info.start, &end_point);
4824  } else if (location_in_selected_text (view,
4825  event->x + view->scroll_x,
4826  event->y + view->scroll_y)) {
4827  view->selection_info.in_drag = TRUE;
4828  } else {
4829  start_selection_for_event (view, event);
4830  if (position_caret_cursor_for_event (view, event, TRUE)) {
4831  view->cursor_blink_time = 0;
4832  ev_view_pend_cursor_blink (view);
4833  }
4834  }
4835  } else if ((annot = ev_view_get_annotation_at_location (view, event->x, event->y))) {
4836  ev_view_handle_annotation (view, annot, event->x, event->y, event->time);
4837  } else if ((field = ev_view_get_form_field_at_location (view, event->x, event->y))) {
4838  ev_view_remove_all (view);
4839  ev_view_handle_form_field (view, field);
4840  } else if ((link = get_link_mapping_at_location (view, event->x, event->y, &page))){
4841  _ev_view_set_focused_element (view, link, page);
4842  } else if (!location_in_text (view, event->x + view->scroll_x, event->y + view->scroll_y) &&
4843  (image = ev_view_get_image_at_location (view, event->x, event->y))) {
4844  if (view->image_dnd_info.image)
4845  g_object_unref (view->image_dnd_info.image);
4846  view->image_dnd_info.image = g_object_ref (image);
4847  view->image_dnd_info.in_drag = TRUE;
4848 
4849  view->image_dnd_info.start.x = event->x + view->scroll_x;
4850  view->image_dnd_info.start.y = event->y + view->scroll_y;
4851  } else {
4852  ev_view_remove_all (view);
4853  _ev_view_set_focused_element (view, NULL, -1);
4854 
4855  if (view->synctex_result) {
4856  g_free (view->synctex_result);
4857  view->synctex_result = NULL;
4858  gtk_widget_queue_draw (widget);
4859  }
4860 
4861  if (EV_IS_SELECTION (view->document))
4862  start_selection_for_event (view, event);
4863 
4864  if (position_caret_cursor_for_event (view, event, TRUE)) {
4865  view->cursor_blink_time = 0;
4866  ev_view_pend_cursor_blink (view);
4867  }
4868  }
4869  }
4870  return TRUE;
4871  case 2:
4872  /* use root coordinates as reference point because
4873  * scrolling changes window relative coordinates */
4874  view->drag_info.start.x = event->x_root;
4875  view->drag_info.start.y = event->y_root;
4876  view->drag_info.hadj = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment);
4877  view->drag_info.vadj = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
4878 
4879  ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_DRAG);
4880  ev_view_set_focused_element_at_location (view, event->x, event->y);
4881  return TRUE;
4882  case 3:
4883  view->scroll_info.start_y = event->y;
4884  ev_view_set_focused_element_at_location (view, event->x, event->y);
4885  return ev_view_do_popup_menu (view, event->x, event->y);
4886  }
4887 
4888  return FALSE;
4889 }

5319  ev_view_update_primary_selection (view);
5320 
5321  position_caret_cursor_for_event (view, event, FALSE);
5322 
5323  if (view->selection_info.in_drag)
5324  clear_selection (view);
5325  view->selection_info.in_drag = FALSE;
5326  } else if (link) {
5327  if (event->button == 2) {
5328  EvLinkAction *action;
5329  EvLinkActionType type;
5330 
5331  action = ev_link_get_action (link);
5332  if (!action)
5333  return FALSE;
5334 
5335  type = ev_link_action_get_action_type (action);
5336  if (type == EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_GOTO_DEST) {
5337  g_signal_emit (view,
5338  signals[SIGNAL_EXTERNAL_LINK],
5339  0, action);
5340  }
5341  } else {
5342  ev_view_handle_link (view, link);
5343  }
5344  }
5345 
5346  return FALSE;
5347 }

static void ev_view_continuous_changed_cb ( EvDocumentModel *  model,

2466  }
2467 
2468  g_signal_connect (text, "focus-out-event",
2469  G_CALLBACK (ev_view_form_field_text_focus_out),
2470  view);
2471  g_signal_connect (buffer, "changed",
2472  G_CALLBACK (ev_view_form_field_text_changed),
2473  field);
2474  }
2475  break;
2476  }
2477 
2478  g_object_weak_ref (G_OBJECT (text),
2479  (GWeakNotify)ev_view_form_field_text_save,
2480  view);
2481 
2482  return text;
2483 }

gint  page,
GdkRectangle *  page_area,

)

Definition at line 1219 of file ev-view.c.

1223 {
1224  GtkWidget *widget;
1225  int width, height;
1226  GtkAllocation allocation;
1227 
1228  widget = GTK_WIDGET (view);
1229  gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
1230 
1231  /* Get the size of the page */
1232  ev_view_get_page_size (view, page, &width, &height);
1233  compute_border (view, border);
1234  page_area->width = width + border->left + border->right;
1235  page_area->height = height + border->top + border->bottom;
1236 
1237  if (view->continuous) {
1238  gint max_width;
1239  gint x, y;
1240  gboolean odd_left;
1241 
1242  ev_view_get_max_page_size (view, &max_width, NULL);
1243  max_width = max_width + border->left + border->right;
1244  /* Get the location of the bounding box */
1245  if (is_dual_page (view, &odd_left)) {
1246  x = view->spacing + ((page % 2 == !odd_left) ? 0 : 1) * (max_width + view->spacing);
1247  x = x + MAX (0, allocation.width - (max_width * 2 + view->spacing * 3)) / 2;
1248  if (page % 2 == !odd_left)
1249  x = x + (max_width - width - border->left - border->right);
1250  } else {
1251  x = view->spacing;
1252  x = x + MAX (0, allocation.width - (width + border->left + border->right + view->spacing * 2)) / 2;
1253  }
1254 
1255  get_page_y_offset (view, page, &y);
1256 
1257  page_area->x = x;
1258  page_area->y = y;
1259  } else {
1260  gint x, y;
1261  gboolean odd_left;
1262 
1263  if (is_dual_page (view, &odd_left)) {
1264  gint width_2, height_2;
1265  gint max_width = width;
1266  gint max_height = height;
1267  GtkBorder overall_border;
1268  gint other_page;
1269 
1270  other_page = (page % 2 == !odd_left) ? page + 1: page - 1;
1271 
1272  /* First, we get the bounding box of the two pages */
1273  if (other_page < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document)
1274  && (0 <= other_page)) {
1275  ev_view_get_page_size (view, other_page,
1276  &width_2, &height_2);
1277  if (width_2 > width)
1278  max_width = width_2;
1279  if (height_2 > height)
1280  max_height = height_2;
1281  }
1282  compute_border (view, &overall_border);
1283 
1284  /* Find the offsets */
1285  x = view->spacing;
1286  y = view->spacing;
1287 
1288  /* Adjust for being the left or right page */
1289  if (page % 2 == !odd_left)
1290  x = x + max_width - width;
1291  else
1292  x = x + (max_width + overall_border.left + overall_border.right) + view->spacing;
1293 
1294  y = y + (max_height - height)/2;
1295 
1296  /* Adjust for extra allocation */
1297  x = x + MAX (0, allocation.width -
1298  ((max_width + overall_border.left + overall_border.right) * 2 + view->spacing * 3))/2;
1299  y = y + MAX (0, allocation.height - (height + view->spacing * 2))/2;
1300  } else {
1301  x = view->spacing;
1302  y = view->spacing;
1303 
1304  /* Adjust for extra allocation */
1305  x = x + MAX (0, allocation.width - (width + border->left + border->right + view->spacing * 2))/2;
1306  y = y + MAX (0, allocation.height - (height + border->top + border->bottom + view->spacing * 2))/2;
1307  }
1308 
1309  page_area->x = x;
1310  page_area->y = y;
1311  }
1312 
1313  return TRUE;
1314 }

static void ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy ( EvView *  view,

)

Definition at line 2073 of file ev-view.c.

2074 {
2075  EvLink *link;

2077  EvAnnotation *annot = NULL;
2078 
2079  if (view->cursor == EV_VIEW_CURSOR_HIDDEN)
2080  return;
2081 
2082  if (view->adding_annot) {
2083  if (view->cursor != EV_VIEW_CURSOR_ADD)
2084  ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_ADD);
2085  return;
2086  }
2087

2089  if (view->cursor != EV_VIEW_CURSOR_DRAG)
2090  ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_DRAG);
2091  return;
2092  }
2093

2095  if (view->cursor != EV_VIEW_CURSOR_AUTOSCROLL)
2096  ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_AUTOSCROLL);

2102  ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_LINK);
2103  } else if ((field = ev_view_get_form_field_at_location (view, x, y))) {
2104  if (field->is_read_only) {
2105  if (view->cursor == EV_VIEW_CURSOR_LINK ||
2106  view->cursor == EV_VIEW_CURSOR_IBEAM ||
2107  view->cursor == EV_VIEW_CURSOR_DRAG)
2108  ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_NORMAL);
2109  } else if (EV_IS_FORM_FIELD_TEXT (field)) {
2110  ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_IBEAM);
2111  } else {
2112  ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_LINK);
2113  }
2114  } else if ((annot = ev_view_get_annotation_at_location (view, x, y))) {
2115  ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_LINK);
2116  } else if (location_in_text (view, x + view->scroll_x, y + view->scroll_y)) {
2117  ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_IBEAM);
2118  } else {
2119  if (view->cursor == EV_VIEW_CURSOR_LINK ||
2120  view->cursor == EV_VIEW_CURSOR_IBEAM ||
2121  view->cursor == EV_VIEW_CURSOR_DRAG ||
2122  view->cursor == EV_VIEW_CURSOR_AUTOSCROLL ||
2123  view->cursor == EV_VIEW_CURSOR_ADD)
2124  ev_view_set_cursor (view, EV_VIEW_CURSOR_NORMAL);
2125  }
2126 
2127  if (link || annot)
2128  g_object_set (view, "has-tooltip", TRUE, NULL);
2129 }

void ev_view_handle_link ( EvView *  view,
EvLink *  link 
)

Definition at line 1934 of file ev-view.c.

1935 {
1936  EvLinkAction *action = NULL;
1937  EvLinkActionType type;
1938 
1939  action = ev_link_get_action (link);
1940  if (!action)
1941  return;
1942 
1943  type = ev_link_action_get_action_type (action);
1944 
1945  switch (type) {
1946  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_GOTO_DEST: {
1947  EvLinkDest *dest;
1948 
1949  g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_HANDLE_LINK], 0, link);
1950 
1951  dest = ev_link_action_get_dest (action);
1952  ev_view_goto_dest (view, dest);
1953  }
1954  break;
1955  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_LAYERS_STATE: {
1956  GList *show, *hide, *toggle;
1957  GList *l;
1958  EvDocumentLayers *document_layers;
1959 
1960  document_layers = EV_DOCUMENT_LAYERS (view->document);
1961 
1962  show = ev_link_action_get_show_list (action);
1963  for (l = show; l; l = g_list_next (l)) {
1964  ev_document_layers_show_layer (document_layers, EV_LAYER (l->data));
1965  }
1966 
1967  hide = ev_link_action_get_hide_list (action);
1968  for (l = hide; l; l = g_list_next (l)) {
1969  ev_document_layers_hide_layer (document_layers, EV_LAYER (l->data));
1970  }
1971 
1972  toggle = ev_link_action_get_toggle_list (action);
1973  for (l = toggle; l; l = g_list_next (l)) {
1974  EvLayer *layer = EV_LAYER (l->data);
1975 
1976  if (ev_document_layers_layer_is_visible (document_layers, layer)) {
1977  ev_document_layers_hide_layer (document_layers, layer);
1978  } else {
1979  ev_document_layers_show_layer (document_layers, layer);
1980  }
1981  }
1982 
1983  g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_LAYERS_CHANGED], 0);
1984  ev_view_reload_page (view, view->current_page, NULL);
1985  }
1986  break;
1987  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_GOTO_REMOTE:
1988  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_EXTERNAL_URI:
1989  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_LAUNCH:
1990  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_NAMED:
1991  g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_EXTERNAL_LINK], 0, action);
1992  break;
1993  }
1994 }

6750

6752  }
6753

5095 {
5096  EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget);
5097  GdkWindow *window;
5098  gint x, y;
5099 
5100  if (!view->document)
5101  return FALSE;
5102 
5103  if (gtk_gesture_is_recognized (view->zoom_gesture))
5104  return TRUE;
5105 
5106  window = gtk_widget_get_window (widget);
5107 
5108  if (event->is_hint || event->window != window) {
5109  ev_document_misc_get_pointer_position (widget, &x, &y);
5110  } else {
5111  x = event->x;
5112  y = event->y;
5113  }
5114 
5115  if (view->scroll_info.autoscrolling) {
5116  if (y >= 0)
5117  view->scroll_info.last_y = y;
5118  return TRUE;
5119  }
5120 
5121  if (view->selection_info.in_drag) {
5122  if (gtk_drag_check_threshold (widget,
5123  view->selection_info.start.x,
5124  view->selection_info.start.y,
5125  x, y)) {
5126  GtkTargetList *target_list = gtk_target_list_new (NULL, 0);
5127 
5128  gtk_target_list_add_text_targets (target_list, TARGET_DND_TEXT);
5129 
5130  gtk_drag_begin (widget, target_list,
5131  GDK_ACTION_COPY,
5132  1, (GdkEvent *)event);
5133 
5134  view->selection_info.in_drag = FALSE;
5135 
5136  gtk_target_list_unref (target_list);
5137 
5138  return TRUE;
5139  }
5140  } else if (view->image_dnd_info.in_drag) {
5141  if (gtk_drag_check_threshold (widget,
5142  view->selection_info.start.x,
5143  view->selection_info.start.y,
5144  x, y)) {
5145  GtkTargetList *target_list = gtk_target_list_new (NULL, 0);
5146 
5147  gtk_target_list_add_uri_targets (target_list, TARGET_DND_URI);
5148  gtk_target_list_add_image_targets (target_list, TARGET_DND_IMAGE, TRUE);
5149 
5150  gtk_drag_begin (widget, target_list,
5151  GDK_ACTION_COPY,
5152  1, (GdkEvent *)event);
5153 
5154  view->image_dnd_info.in_drag = FALSE;
5155 
5156  gtk_target_list_unref (target_list);
5157 
5158  return TRUE;
5159  }
5160  }
5161 
5162  switch (view->pressed_button) {
5163  case 1:
5164  /* For the Evince 0.4.x release, we limit selection to un-rotated
5165  * documents only.
5166  */
5167  if (view->rotation != 0)
5168  return FALSE;
5169 
5170  /* Schedule timeout to scroll during selection and additionally
5171  * scroll once to allow arbitrary speed. */
5172  if (!view->selection_scroll_id)
5173  view->selection_scroll_id = g_timeout_add (SCROLL_TIME,
5174  (GSourceFunc)selection_scroll_timeout_cb,
5175  view);
5176  else
5177  selection_scroll_timeout_cb (view);
5178 
5179  view->motion.x = x + view->scroll_x;
5180  view->motion.y = y + view->scroll_y;
5181 
5182  /* Queue an idle to handle the motion. We do this because
5183  * handling any selection events in the motion could be slower
5184  * than new motion events reach us. We always put it in the
5185  * idle to make sure we catch up and don't visibly lag the
5186  * mouse. */
5187  if (!view->selection_update_id)
5188  view->selection_update_id = g_idle_add ((GSourceFunc)selection_update_idle_cb, view);
5189 
5190  return TRUE;
5191  case 2:
5192  if (!view->drag_info.in_drag) {
5193  gboolean start;
5194  int i;
5195 
5196  start = gtk_drag_check_threshold (widget,
5197  view->drag_info.start.x,
5198  view->drag_info.start.y,
5199  event->x_root,
5200  event->y_root);
5201  view->drag_info.in_drag = start;
5202  view->drag_info.drag_timeout_id = g_timeout_add (10,
5203  (GSourceFunc)ev_view_drag_update_momentum, view);
5204  /* Set 100 to choose how long it takes to build up momentum */
5205  /* Clear out previous momentum info: */
5206  for (i = 0; i < DRAG_HISTORY; i++) {
5207  view->drag_info.buffer[i].x = event->x;
5208  view->drag_info.buffer[i].y = event->y;
5209  }
5210  view->drag_info.momentum.x = 0;
5211  view->drag_info.momentum.y = 0;
5212  }
5213 
5214  if (view->drag_info.in_drag) {
5215  int dx, dy;
5216  gdouble dhadj_value, dvadj_value;
5217  GtkAllocation allocation;
5218 
5219  view->drag_info.buffer[0].x = event->x;
5220  view->drag_info.buffer[0].y = event->y;
5221 
5222  dx = event->x_root - view->drag_info.start.x;
5223  dy = event->y_root - view->drag_info.start.y;
5224 
5225  gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
5226 
5227  dhadj_value = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment) *
5228  (gdouble)dx / allocation.width;
5229  dvadj_value = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment) *
5230  (gdouble)dy / allocation.height;
5231 
5232  /* clamp scrolling to visible area */
5233  gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->hadjustment,
5234  MIN (view->drag_info.hadj - dhadj_value,
5235  gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->hadjustment) -
5236  gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment)));
5237  gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->vadjustment,
5238  MIN (view->drag_info.vadj - dvadj_value,
5239  gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment) -
5240  gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment)));
5241 
5242  return TRUE;
5243  }
5244 
5245  break;
5246  default:
5247  ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy (view, x, y);
5248  }
5249 
5250  return FALSE;
5251 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static gboolean ev_view_move_cursor ( EvView *  view,
GtkMovementStep  step,
gint  count,
gboolean  extend_selections 
)
static

Definition at line 5738 of file ev-view.c.

5742 {
5743  GdkRectangle rect;
5744  GdkRectangle prev_rect;
5745  gint prev_offset;
5746  gint prev_page;
5747  cairo_region_t *damage_region;
5748  gboolean clear_selections = FALSE;
5749 
5750  if (!view->caret_enabled || view->rotation != 0)
5751  return FALSE;
5752 
5753  view->key_binding_handled = TRUE;
5754  view->cursor_blink_time = 0;
5755 
5756  prev_offset = view->cursor_offset;
5757  prev_page = view->cursor_page;
5758 
5759  clear_selections = !extend_selections && view->selection_info.selections != NULL;
5760 
5761  switch (step) {
5762  case GTK_MOVEMENT_VISUAL_POSITIONS:
5763  if (!clear_selections || !cursor_clear_selection (view, count > 0)) {
5764  while (count > 0) {
5765  cursor_forward_char (view);
5766  count--;
5767  }
5768  while (count < 0) {
5769  cursor_backward_char (view);
5770  count++;
5771  }
5772  }
5773  break;
5774  case GTK_MOVEMENT_WORDS:
5775  while (count > 0) {
5776  cursor_forward_word_end (view);
5777  count--;
5778  }
5779  while (count < 0) {
5780  cursor_backward_word_start (view);
5781  count++;
5782  }
5783  break;
5784  case GTK_MOVEMENT_DISPLAY_LINES:
5785  while (count > 0) {
5786  cursor_forward_line (view);
5787  count--;
5788  }
5789  while (count < 0) {
5790  cursor_backward_line (view);
5791  count++;
5792  }
5793  break;
5794  case GTK_MOVEMENT_DISPLAY_LINE_ENDS:
5795  if (count > 0)
5796  cursor_go_to_line_end (view);
5797  else if (count < 0)
5798  cursor_go_to_line_start (view);
5799  break;
5800  case GTK_MOVEMENT_BUFFER_ENDS:
5801  if (count > 0)
5802  cursor_go_to_document_end (view);
5803  else if (count < 0)
5804  cursor_go_to_document_start (view);
5805  break;
5806  default:
5807  g_assert_not_reached ();
5808  }
5809 
5810  ev_view_pend_cursor_blink (view);
5811 
5812  /* Notify the user that it was not possible to move the caret cursor */
5813  if (!clear_selections &&
5814  prev_offset == view->cursor_offset && prev_page == view->cursor_page) {
5815  gtk_widget_error_bell (GTK_WIDGET (view));
5816  return TRUE;
5817  }
5818 
5819  /* Scroll to make the caret visible */
5820  if (!get_caret_cursor_area (view, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset, &rect))
5821  return TRUE;
5822 
5823  if (step == GTK_MOVEMENT_DISPLAY_LINES) {
5824  position_caret_cursor_at_location (view,
5825  MAX (rect.x, view->cursor_line_offset),
5826  rect.y + (rect.height / 2));
5827  if (!clear_selections &&
5828  prev_offset == view->cursor_offset && prev_page == view->cursor_page) {
5829  gtk_widget_error_bell (GTK_WIDGET (view));
5830  return TRUE;
5831  }
5832 
5833  if (!get_caret_cursor_area (view, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset, &rect))
5834  return TRUE;
5835  } else {
5836  view->cursor_line_offset = rect.x;
5837  }
5838 
5839  damage_region = cairo_region_create_rectangle (&rect);
5840  if (get_caret_cursor_area (view, prev_page, prev_offset, &prev_rect))
5841  cairo_region_union_rectangle (damage_region, &prev_rect);
5842 
5843  rect.x += view->scroll_x;
5844  rect.y += view->scroll_y;
5845 
5846  ev_document_model_set_page (view->model, view->cursor_page);
5847  ensure_rectangle_is_visible (view, &rect);
5848 
5849  g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_CURSOR_MOVED], 0, view->cursor_page, view->cursor_offset);
5850 
5851  gdk_window_invalidate_region (gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (view)),
5852  damage_region, TRUE);
5853  cairo_region_destroy (damage_region);
5854 
5855  /* Select text */
5856  if (extend_selections && EV_IS_SELECTION (view->document)) {
5857  GdkPoint start_point, end_point;
5858 
5859  start_point.x = prev_rect.x + view->scroll_x;
5860  start_point.y = prev_rect.y + (prev_rect.height / 2) + view->scroll_y;
5861 
5862  end_point.x = rect.x;
5863  end_point.y = rect.y + rect.height / 2;
5864 
5865  extend_selection (view, &start_point, &end_point);
5866  } else if (clear_selections)
5867  clear_selection (view);
5868 
5869  return TRUE;
5870 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

void ev_view_scroll ( EvView *  view,
GtkScrollType  scroll,
gboolean  horizontal 
)

ev_view_scroll: : a EvView : :

Deprecated: 3.10

Definition at line 967 of file ev-view.c.

970 {
971  GtkAdjustment *adjustment;
972  double value, increment;
973  gdouble upper, lower;
974  gdouble page_size;
975  gdouble step_increment;
976  gboolean first_page = FALSE;
977  gboolean last_page = FALSE;
978 
979  if (view->key_binding_handled)
980  return;
981 
982  view->jump_to_find_result = FALSE;
983 
984  if (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE) {
985  switch (scroll) {
986  case GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD:
987  case GTK_SCROLL_STEP_BACKWARD:
988  ev_view_previous_page (view);
989  break;
990  case GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_FORWARD:
991  case GTK_SCROLL_STEP_FORWARD:
992  ev_view_next_page (view);
993  break;
994  default:
995  break;
996  }
997  return;
998  }
999 
1000  /* Assign values for increment and vertical adjustment */
1001  adjustment = horizontal ? view->hadjustment : view->vadjustment;
1002  value = gtk_adjustment_get_value (adjustment);
1003  upper = gtk_adjustment_get_upper (adjustment);
1004  lower = gtk_adjustment_get_lower (adjustment);
1005  page_size = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (adjustment);
1006  step_increment = gtk_adjustment_get_step_increment (adjustment);
1007 
1008  /* Assign boolean for first and last page */
1009  if (view->current_page == 0)
1010  first_page = TRUE;
1011  if (view->current_page == ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document) - 1)
1012  last_page = TRUE;
1013 
1014  switch (scroll) {
1015  case GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD:
1016  /* Do not jump backwards if at the first page */
1017  if (value == lower && first_page) {
1018  /* Do nothing */
1019  /* At the top of a page, assign the upper bound limit of previous page */
1020  } else if (value == lower) {
1021  value = upper - page_size;
1022  ev_view_previous_page (view);
1023  /* Jump to the top */
1024  } else {
1025  increment = compute_scroll_increment (view, GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_BACKWARD);
1026  value = MAX (value - increment, lower);
1027  }
1028  break;
1029  case GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_FORWARD:
1030  /* Do not jump forward if at the last page */
1031  if (value == (upper - page_size) && last_page) {
1032  /* Do nothing */
1033  /* At the bottom of a page, assign the lower bound limit of next page */
1034  } else if (value == (upper - page_size)) {
1035  value = 0;
1036  ev_view_next_page (view);
1037  /* Jump to the bottom */
1038  } else {
1039  increment = compute_scroll_increment (view, GTK_SCROLL_PAGE_FORWARD);
1040  value = MIN (value + increment, upper - page_size);
1041  }
1042  break;
1043  case GTK_SCROLL_STEP_BACKWARD:
1044  value -= step_increment;
1045  break;
1046  case GTK_SCROLL_STEP_FORWARD:
1047  value += step_increment;
1048  break;
1049  case GTK_SCROLL_STEP_DOWN:
1050  value -= step_increment / 10;
1051  break;
1052  case GTK_SCROLL_STEP_UP:
1053  value += step_increment / 10;
1054  break;
1055  case GTK_SCROLL_START:
1056  value = lower;
1057  if (!first_page)
1058  ev_view_first_page (view);
1059  break;
1060  case GTK_SCROLL_END:
1061  value = upper - page_size;
1062  if (!last_page)
1063  ev_view_last_page (view);
1064  /* Changing pages causes the top to be shown. Here we want the bottom shown. */
1065  view->pending_point.y = value;
1066  break;
1067  default:
1068  break;
1069  }
1070 
1071  value = CLAMP (value, lower, upper - page_size);
1072 
1073  gtk_adjustment_set_value (adjustment, value);
1074 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static gboolean ev_view_scroll_drag_release ( EvView *  view)
static

Definition at line 5042 of file ev-view.c.

5043 {
5044  gdouble dhadj_value, dvadj_value;
5045  gdouble oldhadjustment, oldvadjustment;
5046  gdouble h_page_size, v_page_size;
5047  gdouble h_upper, v_upper;
5048  GtkAllocation allocation;
5049 
5050  view->drag_info.momentum.x /= 1.2;
5051  view->drag_info.momentum.y /= 1.2; /* Alter these constants to change "friction" */
5052 
5053  gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (view), &allocation);
5054 
5055  h_page_size = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment);
5056  v_page_size = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment);
5057 
5058  dhadj_value = h_page_size *
5059  (gdouble)view->drag_info.momentum.x / allocation.width;
5060  dvadj_value = v_page_size *
5061  (gdouble)view->drag_info.momentum.y / allocation.height;
5062 
5063  oldhadjustment = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment);
5064  oldvadjustment = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
5065 
5066  h_upper = gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->hadjustment);
5067  v_upper = gtk_adjustment_get_upper (view->vadjustment);
5068 
5069  /* When we reach the edges, we need either to absorb some momentum and bounce by
5070  * multiplying it on -0.5 or stop scrolling by setting momentum to 0. */
5071  if (((oldhadjustment + dhadj_value) > (h_upper - h_page_size)) ||
5072  ((oldhadjustment + dhadj_value) < 0))
5073  view->drag_info.momentum.x = 0;
5074  if (((oldvadjustment + dvadj_value) > (v_upper - v_page_size)) ||
5075  ((oldvadjustment + dvadj_value) < 0))
5076  view->drag_info.momentum.y = 0;
5077 
5078  gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->hadjustment,
5079  MIN (oldhadjustment + dhadj_value,
5080  h_upper - h_page_size));
5081  gtk_adjustment_set_value (view->vadjustment,
5082  MIN (oldvadjustment + dvadj_value,
5083  v_upper - v_page_size));
5084 
5085  if (((view->drag_info.momentum.x < 1) && (view->drag_info.momentum.x > -1)) &&
5086  ((view->drag_info.momentum.y < 1) && (view->drag_info.momentum.y > -1)))
5087  return FALSE;
5088  else
5089  return TRUE;
5090 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static gboolean ev_view_scroll_event ( GtkWidget *  widget,
GdkEventScroll *  event 
)
static

Definition at line 3965 of file ev-view.c.

3966 {
3967  EvView *view = EV_VIEW (widget);
3968  guint state;
3969 
3970  state = event->state & gtk_accelerator_get_default_mod_mask ();
3971 
3972  if (state == GDK_CONTROL_MASK) {
3973  ev_document_model_set_sizing_mode (view->model, EV_SIZING_FREE);
3974  view->zoom_center_x = event->x;
3975  view->zoom_center_y = event->y;
3976 
3977  switch (event->direction) {
3978  case GDK_SCROLL_DOWN:
3979  case GDK_SCROLL_RIGHT:
3980  if (ev_view_can_zoom_out (view))
3981  ev_view_zoom_out (view);
3982  break;
3983  case GDK_SCROLL_UP:
3984  case GDK_SCROLL_LEFT:
3985  if (ev_view_can_zoom_in (view))
3986  ev_view_zoom_in (view);
3987  break;
3988  case GDK_SCROLL_SMOOTH: {
3989  gdouble delta = event->delta_x + event->delta_y;
3990  gdouble factor = pow (delta < 0 ? ZOOM_IN_FACTOR : ZOOM_OUT_FACTOR, fabs (delta));
3991 
3992  if ((factor < 1.0 && ev_view_can_zoom_out (view)) ||
3993  (factor >= 1.0 && ev_view_can_zoom_in (view)))
3994  ev_view_zoom (view, factor);
3995  }
3996  break;
3997  }
3998 
3999  return TRUE;
4000  }
4001 
4002  view->jump_to_find_result = FALSE;
4003 
4004  /* Shift+Wheel scrolls the in the perpendicular direction */
4005  if (state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) {
4006  if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_UP)
4007  event->direction = GDK_SCROLL_LEFT;
4008  else if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_LEFT)
4009  event->direction = GDK_SCROLL_UP;
4010  else if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_DOWN)
4011  event->direction = GDK_SCROLL_RIGHT;
4012  else if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_RIGHT)
4013  event->direction = GDK_SCROLL_DOWN;
4014  else if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_SMOOTH) {
4015  /* Swap the deltas for perpendicular direction */
4016  gdouble tmp_delta = event->delta_x;
4017 
4018  event->delta_x = event->delta_y;
4019  event->delta_y = tmp_delta;
4020  }
4021 
4022  event->state &= ~GDK_SHIFT_MASK;
4023  state &= ~GDK_SHIFT_MASK;
4024  }
4025 
4026  if (state == 0 && view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE && !view->continuous) {
4027  switch (event->direction) {
4028  case GDK_SCROLL_DOWN:
4029  case GDK_SCROLL_RIGHT:
4030  ev_view_next_page (view);
4031  break;
4032  case GDK_SCROLL_UP:
4033  case GDK_SCROLL_LEFT:
4034  ev_view_previous_page (view);
4035  break;
4036  case GDK_SCROLL_SMOOTH: {
4037  gdouble decrement;
4038 
4039  /* Emulate normal scrolling by summing the deltas */
4040  view->total_delta += event->delta_x + event->delta_y;
4041 
4042  decrement = view->total_delta < 0 ? -1.0 : 1.0;
4043  for (; fabs (view->total_delta) >= 1.0; view->total_delta -= decrement) {
4044  if (decrement < 0)
4045  ev_view_previous_page (view);
4046  else
4047  ev_view_next_page (view);
4048  }
4049  }
4050  break;
4051  }
4052 
4053  return TRUE;
4054  }
4055 
4056  return FALSE;
4057 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static void ev_view_set_adjustment_values ( EvView *  view,
GtkOrientation  orientation 
)
static

Definition at line 597 of file ev-view.c.

599 {
600  GtkWidget *widget = GTK_WIDGET (view);
601  GtkAdjustment *adjustment;
602  GtkAllocation allocation;
603  int req_size;
604  int alloc_size;
605  gdouble page_size;
606  gdouble value;
607  gdouble upper;
608  double factor;
609  gint new_value;
610  gdouble zoom_center;
611 
612  gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
613 
614  if (orientation == GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL) {
615  req_size = view->requisition.width;
616  alloc_size = allocation.width;
617  adjustment = view->hadjustment;
618  zoom_center = view->zoom_center_x;
619  } else {
620  req_size = view->requisition.height;
621  alloc_size = allocation.height;
622  adjustment = view->vadjustment;
623  zoom_center = view->zoom_center_y;
624  }
625 
626  if (!adjustment)
627  return;
628 
629  factor = 1.0;
630  value = gtk_adjustment_get_value (adjustment);
631  upper = gtk_adjustment_get_upper (adjustment);
632  page_size = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (adjustment);
633  if (zoom_center < 0)
634  zoom_center = page_size * 0.5;
635 
636  if (upper != .0) {
637  switch (view->pending_scroll) {
638  case SCROLL_TO_KEEP_POSITION:
639  case SCROLL_TO_FIND_LOCATION:
640  factor = value / upper;
641  break;
642  case SCROLL_TO_PAGE_POSITION:
643  break;
644  case SCROLL_TO_CENTER:
645  factor = (value + zoom_center) / upper;
646  break;
647  }
648  }
649 
650  upper = MAX (alloc_size, req_size);
651  page_size = alloc_size;
652 
653  gtk_adjustment_set_page_size (adjustment, page_size);
654  gtk_adjustment_set_step_increment (adjustment, alloc_size * 0.1);
655  gtk_adjustment_set_page_increment (adjustment, alloc_size * 0.9);
656  gtk_adjustment_set_lower (adjustment, 0);
657  gtk_adjustment_set_upper (adjustment, upper);
658 
659  /*
660  * We add 0.5 to the values before to average out our rounding errors.
661  */
662  switch (view->pending_scroll) {
663  case SCROLL_TO_KEEP_POSITION:
664  case SCROLL_TO_FIND_LOCATION:
665  new_value = CLAMP (upper * factor + 0.5, 0, upper - page_size);
666  gtk_adjustment_set_value (adjustment, (int)new_value);
667  break;
668  case SCROLL_TO_PAGE_POSITION:
669  ev_view_scroll_to_page_position (view, orientation);
670  break;
671  case SCROLL_TO_CENTER:
672  new_value = CLAMP (upper * factor - zoom_center + 0.5, 0, upper - page_size);
673  if (orientation == GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL)
674  view->zoom_center_x = -1.0;
675  else
676  view->zoom_center_y = -1.0;
677  gtk_adjustment_set_value (adjustment, (int)new_value);
678  break;
679  }
680 
681  gtk_adjustment_changed (adjustment);
682 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

void ev_view_set_page_cache_size ( EvView *  view,
gsize  cache_size 
)

ev_view_set_page_cache_size: : EvView instance : size in bytes

Sets the maximum size in bytes that will be used to cache rendered pages. Use 0 to disable caching rendered pages.

Note that this limit doesn't affect the current visible page range, which will always be rendered. In order to limit the total memory used you have to use ev_document_model_set_max_scale() too.

Definition at line 7420 of file ev-view.c.

7424  return;
7425 
7426  view->pixbuf_cache_size = cache_size;
7427  if (view->pixbuf_cache)
7428  ev_pixbuf_cache_set_max_size (view->pixbuf_cache, cache_size);
7429 
7430  view_update_scale_limits (view);
7431 }

3889  allocation->x,
3890  allocation->y,
3891  allocation->width,
3892  allocation->height);
3893

3895  return;
3896

3898  view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE ||

3901

3903  allocation->width,

3938  &root_x, &root_y);

3941  EvViewWindowChild *child;
3942  EvRectangle doc_rect;
3943  GdkRectangle view_rect;
3944 
3945  child = (EvViewWindowChild *)l->data;
3946 
3947  ev_annotation_window_get_rectangle (EV_ANNOTATION_WINDOW (child->window), &doc_rect);
3948  if (child->moved) {
3949  doc_rect.x1 = child->orig_x;
3950  doc_rect.y1 = child->orig_y;
3951  }
3952  _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, child->page, &doc_rect, &view_rect);
3953  view_rect.x -= view->scroll_x;
3954  view_rect.y -= view->scroll_y;
3955 
3956  if (view_rect.x != child->orig_x || view_rect.y != child->orig_y) {
3957  child->parent_x = root_x;
3958  child->parent_y = root_y;
3959  ev_view_window_child_move (view, child, view_rect.x + root_x, view_rect.y + root_y);
3960  }
3961  }
3962 }

3760  requisition->width = 1;
3761  requisition->height = 1;

3768  view->current_page,
3769  &width, &height);

3773  view->current_page + 1,
3774  &width_2, &height_2);

3776  width = width_2;
3777  height = height_2;
3778  }
3779  }

3784  requisition->height = (height + border.top + border.bottom) + (view->spacing * 2);
3785 }

static void ev_view_zoom_for_size ( EvView *  view,
int  width,
int  height 
)
static

Definition at line 8078 of file ev-view.c.

8081 {
8082  gboolean dual_page;
8083

8085  g_return_if_fail (view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH ||
8086  view->sizing_mode == EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE ||

int  width,
int  height 
)

Definition at line 7946 of file ev-view.c.

7949 {
7950  gdouble doc_width, doc_height;

7952  gdouble scale;
7953  gint sb_size;
7954 
7955  ev_document_get_max_page_size (view->document, &doc_width, &doc_height);
7956  if (view->rotation == 90 || view->rotation == 270) {
7957  gdouble tmp;
7958 
7959  tmp = doc_width;
7960  doc_width = doc_height;
7961  doc_height = tmp;
7962  }
7963 
7964  compute_border (view, &border);
7965 
7966  width -= (border.left + border.right + 2 * view->spacing);

7973  scale = zoom_for_size_fit_width (doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
7974  break;

7976  scale = zoom_for_size_fit_page (doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);

7984  }

static void ev_view_zoom_for_size_dual_page ( EvView *  view,
int  width,
int  height 
)
static

Definition at line 7990 of file ev-view.c.

7993 {
7994  GtkBorder border;
7995  gdouble doc_width, doc_height;
7996  gdouble scale;
7997  gint other_page;
7998  gint sb_size;
7999 
8000  other_page = view->current_page ^ 1;
8001 
8002  /* Find the largest of the two. */
8003  get_doc_page_size (view, view->current_page, &doc_width, &doc_height);
8004  if (other_page < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document)) {
8005  gdouble width_2, height_2;
8006 
8007  get_doc_page_size (view, other_page, &width_2, &height_2);
8008  if (width_2 > doc_width)
8009  doc_width = width_2;
8010  if (height_2 > doc_height)
8011  doc_height = height_2;
8012  }
8013  compute_border (view, &border);
8014 
8015  doc_width = doc_width * 2;
8016  width -= ((border.left + border.right)* 2 + 3 * view->spacing);
8017  height -= (border.top + border.bottom + 2 * view->spacing);
8018 
8019  switch (view->sizing_mode) {
8020  case EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH:
8021  sb_size = ev_view_get_scrollbar_size (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
8022  scale = zoom_for_size_fit_width (doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
8023  break;
8024  case EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE:
8025  scale = zoom_for_size_fit_page (doc_width, doc_height, width, height);
8026  break;
8027  case EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC:
8028  sb_size = ev_view_get_scrollbar_size (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
8029  scale = zoom_for_size_automatic (gtk_widget_get_screen (GTK_WIDGET (view)),
8030  doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
8031  break;
8032  default:
8033  g_assert_not_reached ();
8034  }
8035 
8036  ev_document_model_set_scale (view->model, scale);
8037 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static void ev_view_zoom_for_size_single_page ( EvView *  view,
int  width,
int  height 
)
static

Definition at line 8040 of file ev-view.c.

8043 {
8044  gdouble doc_width, doc_height;
8045  GtkBorder border;
8046  gdouble scale;
8047  gint sb_size;
8048 
8049  get_doc_page_size (view, view->current_page, &doc_width, &doc_height);
8050 
8051  /* Get an approximate border */
8052  compute_border (view, &border);
8053 
8054  width -= (border.left + border.right + 2 * view->spacing);
8055  height -= (border.top + border.bottom + 2 * view->spacing);
8056 
8057  switch (view->sizing_mode) {
8058  case EV_SIZING_FIT_WIDTH:
8059  sb_size = ev_view_get_scrollbar_size (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
8060  scale = zoom_for_size_fit_width (doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
8061  break;
8062  case EV_SIZING_FIT_PAGE:
8063  scale = zoom_for_size_fit_page (doc_width, doc_height, width, height);
8064  break;
8065  case EV_SIZING_AUTOMATIC:
8066  sb_size = ev_view_get_scrollbar_size (view, GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL);
8067  scale = zoom_for_size_automatic (gtk_widget_get_screen (GTK_WIDGET (view)),
8068  doc_width, doc_height, width - sb_size, height);
8069  break;
8070  default:
8071  g_assert_not_reached ();
8072  }

1493  continue;

1496  (x < page_area.x + page_area.width - border.right) &&

1498  (y < page_area.y + page_area.height - border.bottom)) {

G_DEFINE_TYPE_WITH_CODE ( EvView  ,
ev_view  ,
GTK_TYPE_CONTAINER  ,
G_IMPLEMENT_INTERFACE(GTK_TYPE_SCROLLABLE, NULL)   
)

Definition at line 290 of file ev-view.c.

299 {
300  gboolean swap, uniform;
301  int i;
302  double uniform_height, page_height, next_page_height;
303  double saved_height;
304  gdouble u_width, u_height;
305  gint n_pages;
306  EvDocument *document = view->document;
307 
308  swap = (view->rotation == 90 || view->rotation == 270);
309 
310  uniform = ev_document_is_page_size_uniform (document);
311  n_pages = ev_document_get_n_pages (document);
312 
313  g_free (cache->height_to_page);
314  g_free (cache->dual_height_to_page);
315 
316  cache->rotation = view->rotation;
317  cache->dual_even_left = view->dual_even_left;
318  cache->height_to_page = g_new0 (gdouble, n_pages + 1);
319  cache->dual_height_to_page = g_new0 (gdouble, n_pages + 2);
320 
321  if (uniform)
322  ev_document_get_page_size (document, 0, &u_width, &u_height);
323 
324  saved_height = 0;
325  for (i = 0; i <= n_pages; i++) {
326  if (uniform) {
327  uniform_height = swap ? u_width : u_height;
328  cache->height_to_page[i] = i * uniform_height;
329  } else {
330  if (i < n_pages) {
331  gdouble w, h;
332 
333  ev_document_get_page_size (document, i, &w, &h);
334  page_height = swap ? w : h;
335  } else {
336  page_height = 0;
337  }
338  cache->height_to_page[i] = saved_height;
339  saved_height += page_height;
340  }
341  }
342 
343  if (cache->dual_even_left && !uniform) {
344  gdouble w, h;
345 
346  ev_document_get_page_size (document, 0, &w, &h);
347  saved_height = swap ? w : h;
348  } else {
349  saved_height = 0;
350  }
351 
352  for (i = cache->dual_even_left; i < n_pages + 2; i += 2) {
353  if (uniform) {
354  uniform_height = swap ? u_width : u_height;
355  cache->dual_height_to_page[i] = ((i + cache->dual_even_left) / 2) * uniform_height;
356  if (i + 1 < n_pages + 2)
357  cache->dual_height_to_page[i + 1] = ((i + cache->dual_even_left) / 2) * uniform_height;
358  } else {
359  if (i + 1 < n_pages) {
360  gdouble w, h;
361 
362  ev_document_get_page_size (document, i + 1, &w, &h);
363  next_page_height = swap ? w : h;
364  } else {
365  next_page_height = 0;
366  }
367 
368  if (i < n_pages) {
369  gdouble w, h;
370 
371  ev_document_get_page_size (document, i, &w, &h);
372  page_height = swap ? w : h;
373  } else {
374  page_height = 0;
375  }
376 
377  if (i + 1 < n_pages + 2) {
378  cache->dual_height_to_page[i] = saved_height;
379  cache->dual_height_to_page[i + 1] = saved_height;
380  saved_height += MAX(page_height, next_page_height);
381  } else {
382  cache->dual_height_to_page[i] = saved_height;
383  }
384  }
385  }
386 }

static gboolean get_caret_cursor_area ( EvView *  view,
gint  page,
gint  offset,
GdkRectangle *  area 
)
static

Definition at line 3410 of file ev-view.c.

3414 {
3415  EvRectangle *areas = NULL;
3416  EvRectangle *doc_rect;
3417  guint n_areas = 0;
3418  gfloat cursor_aspect_ratio;
3419  gint stem_width;
3420 
3421  if (!view->caret_enabled || view->rotation != 0)
3422  return FALSE;
3423 
3424  if (!view->page_cache)
3425  return FALSE;
3426 
3427  ev_page_cache_get_text_layout (view->page_cache, page, &areas, &n_areas);
3428  if (!areas)
3429  return FALSE;
3430 
3431  if (offset > n_areas)
3432  return FALSE;
3433 
3434  doc_rect = areas + offset;
3435  if (offset == n_areas ||
3436  ((doc_rect->x1 == doc_rect->x2 || doc_rect->y1 == doc_rect->y2) && offset > 0)) {
3437  EvRectangle *prev;
3438  EvRectangle last_rect;
3439 
3440  /* Special characters like \n have an empty bounding box
3441  * and the end of a page doesn't have any bounding box,
3442  * use the size of the previous area.
3443  */
3444  prev = areas + offset - 1;
3445  last_rect.x1 = prev->x2;
3446  last_rect.y1 = prev->y1;
3447  last_rect.x2 = prev->x2 + (prev->x2 - prev->x1);
3448  last_rect.y2 = prev->y2;
3449 
3450  _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, page, &last_rect, area);
3451  } else {
3452  _ev_view_transform_doc_rect_to_view_rect (view, page, doc_rect, area);
3453  }
3454 
3455  area->x -= view->scroll_x;
3456  area->y -= view->scroll_y;
3457 
3458  gtk_style_context_get_style (gtk_widget_get_style_context (GTK_WIDGET (view)),
3459  "cursor-aspect-ratio", &cursor_aspect_ratio,
3460  NULL);
3461  stem_width = area->height * cursor_aspect_ratio + 1;
3462  area->x -= (stem_width / 2);
3463  area->width = stem_width;
3464 
3465  return TRUE;
3466 }

static gboolean get_doc_point_from_offset ( EvView *  view,
gint  page,
gint  x_offset,
gint  y_offset,
gint *  x_new,
gint *  y_new 
)
static

Definition at line 1554 of file ev-view.c.

1560 {
1561  gdouble width, height;
1562  double x, y;
1563 
1564  get_doc_page_size (view, page, &width, &height);
1565 
1566  x_offset = x_offset / view->scale;
1567  y_offset = y_offset / view->scale;
1568 
1569  if (view->rotation == 0) {
1570  x = x_offset;
1571  y = y_offset;
1572  } else if (view->rotation == 90) {
1573  x = y_offset;
1574  y = width - x_offset;
1575  } else if (view->rotation == 180) {
1576  x = width - x_offset;
1577  y = height - y_offset;
1578  } else if (view->rotation == 270) {
1579  x = height - y_offset;
1580  y = x_offset;
1581  } else {

1583  }

static gboolean get_selection_page_range ( EvView *  view,
EvSelectionStyle  style,
GdkPoint *  start,
GdkPoint *  stop,
gint *  first_page,
gint *  last_page 
)
static

Definition at line 8389 of file ev-view.c.

8395 {
8396  gint start_page, end_page;
8397  gint first, last;
8398  gint i, n_pages;
8399 
8400  n_pages = ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document);
8401 
8402  if (gdk_point_equal (start, stop)) {
8403  start_page = view->start_page;
8404  end_page = view->end_page;
8405  } else if (view->continuous) {
8406  start_page = 0;
8407  end_page = n_pages - 1;
8408  } else if (is_dual_page (view, NULL)) {
8409  start_page = view->start_page;
8410  end_page = view->end_page;
8411  } else {
8412  start_page = view->current_page;
8413  end_page = view->current_page;
8414  }
8415 
8416  first = -1;
8417  last = -1;
8418  for (i = start_page; i <= end_page; i++) {
8419  GdkRectangle page_area;
8420  GtkBorder border;
8421 
8422  ev_view_get_page_extents (view, i, &page_area, &border);
8423  page_area.x -= border.left;
8424  page_area.y -= border.top;
8425  page_area.width += border.left + border.right;
8426  page_area.height += border.top + border.bottom;
8427  if (gdk_rectangle_point_in (&page_area, start) ||
8428  gdk_rectangle_point_in (&page_area, stop)) {
8429  if (first == -1)
8430  first = i;
8431  last = i;
8432  }
8433  }
8434 
8435  if (first != -1 && last != -1) {
8436  *first_page = first;
8437  *last_page = last;
8438 
8439  return TRUE;
8440  }
8441 
8442  return FALSE;
8443 }

1867 
1868  page = ev_link_dest_get_page (dest);
1869  n_pages = ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document);
1870 
1871  if (page < 0 || page >= n_pages)
1872  return;
1873 
1874  current_page = view->current_page;
1875 
1876  type = ev_link_dest_get_dest_type (dest);
1877 
1878  switch (type) {
1879  case EV_LINK_DEST_TYPE_PAGE:
1880  ev_document_model_set_page (view->model, page);
1881  break;
1882  case EV_LINK_DEST_TYPE_FIT:
1883  goto_fit_dest (view, dest);
1884  break;
1885  case EV_LINK_DEST_TYPE_FITH:
1886  goto_fith_dest (view, dest);
1887  break;
1888  case EV_LINK_DEST_TYPE_FITV:
1889  goto_fitv_dest (view, dest);
1890  break;
1891  case EV_LINK_DEST_TYPE_FITR:
1892  goto_fitr_dest (view, dest);
1893  break;
1894  case EV_LINK_DEST_TYPE_XYZ:
1895  goto_xyz_dest (view, dest);
1896  break;
1897  case EV_LINK_DEST_TYPE_PAGE_LABEL:
1898  ev_document_model_set_page_by_label (view->model, ev_link_dest_get_page_label (dest));
1899  break;
1900  default:
1901  g_assert_not_reached ();
1902  }
1903 
1904  if (current_page != view->current_page)
1905  ev_document_model_set_page (view->model, view->current_page);
1906 }

static gboolean is_dual_page ( EvView *  view,
gboolean *  odd_left_out 
)
static

Definition at line 486 of file ev-view.c.

488 {
489  gboolean dual = FALSE;
490  gboolean odd_left = FALSE;
491 
492  switch (view->page_layout) {
493  case EV_PAGE_LAYOUT_AUTOMATIC: {
494  GdkScreen *screen;
495  double scale;
496  double doc_width;
497  double doc_height;
498  GtkAllocation allocation;
499 
500  screen = gtk_widget_get_screen (GTK_WIDGET (view));
501  scale = ev_document_misc_get_screen_dpi (screen) / 72.0;
502 
503  ev_document_get_max_page_size (view->document, &doc_width, &doc_height);
504  gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (view), &allocation);
505 
506  /* If the width is ok and the height is pretty close, try to fit it in */
507  if (ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document) > 1 &&
508  doc_width < doc_height &&
509  allocation.width > (2 * doc_width * scale) &&
510  allocation.height > (doc_height * scale * 0.9)) {
511  odd_left = !view->dual_even_left;
512  dual = TRUE;
513  }
514  }
515  break;
516  case EV_PAGE_LAYOUT_DUAL:
517  odd_left = !view->dual_even_left;
518  dual = TRUE;
519  break;
520  case EV_PAGE_LAYOUT_SINGLE:
521  break;
522  default:
523  g_assert_not_reached ();
524  }
525 
526  if (odd_left_out)
527  *odd_left_out = odd_left;
528 
529  return dual;
530 }

static void jump_to_find_page ( EvView *  view,
EvViewFindDirection  direction,
gint  shift 
)
static

jump_to_find_page: : EvView instance : Direction to look : Shift from current page

Jumps to the first page that has occurences of searched word. Uses a direction where to look and a shift from current page.

Definition at line 8151 of file ev-view.c.

8152 {
8153  int n_pages, i;
8154 
8155  n_pages = ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document);
8156 
8157  for (i = 0; i < n_pages; i++) {
8158  int page;
8159 
8160  if (direction == EV_VIEW_FIND_NEXT)
8161  page = view->find_page + i;
8162  else
8163  page = view->find_page - i;
8164  page += shift;
8165 
8166  if (page >= n_pages)
8167  page = page - n_pages;
8168  else if (page < 0)
8169  page = page + n_pages;
8170 
8171  if (view->find_pages && view->find_pages[page]) {
8172  view->find_page = page;
8173  break;
8174  }
8175  }
8176 
8177  if (!view->continuous)
8178  ev_document_model_set_page (view->model, view->find_page);
8179 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static void merge_selection_region ( EvView *  view,
GList *  new_list 
)
static

Definition at line 8513 of file ev-view.c.

8515 {
8516  GList *old_list;
8517  GList *new_list_ptr, *old_list_ptr;
8518 
8519  /* Update the selection */
8520  old_list = ev_pixbuf_cache_get_selection_list (view->pixbuf_cache);
8521  g_list_free_full (view->selection_info.selections, (GDestroyNotify)selection_free);
8522  view->selection_info.selections = new_list;
8523  ev_pixbuf_cache_set_selection_list (view->pixbuf_cache, new_list);
8524  g_signal_emit (view, signals[SIGNAL_SELECTION_CHANGED], 0, NULL);
8525 
8526  new_list_ptr = new_list;
8527  old_list_ptr = old_list;
8528 
8529  while (new_list_ptr || old_list_ptr) {
8530  EvViewSelection *old_sel, *new_sel;
8531  int cur_page;
8532  cairo_region_t *region = NULL;
8533 
8534  new_sel = (new_list_ptr) ? (new_list_ptr->data) : NULL;
8535  old_sel = (old_list_ptr) ? (old_list_ptr->data) : NULL;
8536 
8537  /* Assume that the lists are in order, and we run through them
8538  * comparing them, one page at a time. We come out with the
8539  * first page we see. */
8540  if (new_sel && old_sel) {
8541  if (new_sel->page < old_sel->page) {
8542  new_list_ptr = new_list_ptr->next;
8543  old_sel = NULL;
8544  } else if (new_sel->page > old_sel->page) {
8545  old_list_ptr = old_list_ptr->next;
8546  new_sel = NULL;
8547  } else {
8548  new_list_ptr = new_list_ptr->next;
8549  old_list_ptr = old_list_ptr->next;
8550  }
8551  } else if (new_sel) {
8552  new_list_ptr = new_list_ptr->next;
8553  } else if (old_sel) {
8554  old_list_ptr = old_list_ptr->next;
8555  }
8556 
8557  g_assert (new_sel || old_sel);
8558 
8559  /* is the page we're looking at on the screen?*/
8560  cur_page = new_sel ? new_sel->page : old_sel->page;
8561  if (cur_page < view->start_page || cur_page > view->end_page)
8562  continue;
8563 
8564  /* seed the cache with a new page. We are going to need the new
8565  * region too. */
8566  if (new_sel) {
8567  cairo_region_t *tmp_region;
8568 
8569  tmp_region = ev_pixbuf_cache_get_selection_region (view->pixbuf_cache,
8570  cur_page,
8571  view->scale);
8572  if (tmp_region)
8573  new_sel->covered_region = cairo_region_reference (tmp_region);
8574  }
8575 
8576  /* Now we figure out what needs redrawing */
8577  if (old_sel && new_sel) {
8578  if (old_sel->covered_region && new_sel->covered_region) {
8579  if (!cairo_region_equal (old_sel->covered_region, new_sel->covered_region)) {
8580  /* Anything that was previously or currently selected may
8581  * have changed */
8582  region = cairo_region_copy (old_sel->covered_region);
8583  cairo_region_union (region, new_sel->covered_region);
8584  }
8585  } else if (old_sel->covered_region) {
8586  region = cairo_region_reference (old_sel->covered_region);
8587  } else if (new_sel->covered_region) {
8588  region = cairo_region_reference (new_sel->covered_region);
8589  }
8590  } else if (old_sel && !new_sel) {
8591  if (old_sel->covered_region && !cairo_region_is_empty (old_sel->covered_region)) {
8592  region = cairo_region_reference (old_sel->covered_region);
8593  }
8594  } else if (!old_sel && new_sel) {
8595  if (new_sel->covered_region && !cairo_region_is_empty (new_sel->covered_region)) {
8596  region = cairo_region_reference (new_sel->covered_region);
8597  }
8598  } else {
8599  g_assert_not_reached ();
8600  }
8601 
8602  /* Redraw the damaged region! */
8603  if (region) {
8604  GdkRectangle page_area;
8605  GtkBorder border;
8606  cairo_region_t *damage_region;
8607  gint i, n_rects;
8608 
8609  ev_view_get_page_extents (view, cur_page, &page_area, &border);
8610 
8611  damage_region = cairo_region_create ();
8612  /* Translate the region and grow it 2 pixels because for some zoom levels
8613  * the area actually drawn by cairo is larger than the selected region, due
8614  * to rounding errors or pixel alignment.
8615  */
8616  n_rects = cairo_region_num_rectangles (region);
8617  for (i = 0; i < n_rects; i++) {
8618  cairo_rectangle_int_t rect;
8619 
8620  cairo_region_get_rectangle (region, i, &rect);
8621  rect.x += page_area.x + border.left - view->scroll_x - 2;
8622  rect.y += page_area.y + border.top - view->scroll_y - 2;
8623  rect.width += 4;
8624  rect.height += 4;
8625  cairo_region_union_rectangle (damage_region, &rect);
8626  }
8627  cairo_region_destroy (region);
8628 
8629  gdk_window_invalidate_region (gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (view)),
8630  damage_region, TRUE);
8631  cairo_region_destroy (damage_region);
8632  }
8633  }
8634 
8635  ev_view_check_cursor_blink (view);
8636 
8637  /* Free the old list, now that we're done with it. */
8638  g_list_free_full (old_list, (GDestroyNotify)selection_free);
8639 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static void on_adjustment_value_changed ( GtkAdjustment *  adjustment,
EvView *  view 
)
static

Definition at line 7303 of file ev-view.c.

7305 {
7306  GtkWidget *widget = GTK_WIDGET (view);
7307  int dx = 0, dy = 0;
7308  gint x, y;
7309  gint value;
7310  GList *l;
7311 
7312  if (!gtk_widget_get_realized (widget))
7313  return;
7314 
7315  if (view->hadjustment) {
7316  value = (gint) gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment);
7317  dx = view->scroll_x - value;
7318  view->scroll_x = value;
7319  } else {
7320  view->scroll_x = 0;
7321  }
7322 
7323  if (view->vadjustment) {
7324  value = (gint) gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
7325  dy = view->scroll_y - value;
7326  view->scroll_y = value;
7327  } else {
7328  view->scroll_y = 0;
7329  }
7330 
7331  for (l = view->children; l && l->data; l = g_list_next (l)) {
7332  EvViewChild *child = (EvViewChild *)l->data;
7333 
7334  child->x += dx;
7335  child->y += dy;
7336  if (gtk_widget_get_visible (child->widget) && gtk_widget_get_visible (widget))
7337  gtk_widget_queue_resize (widget);
7338  }
7339 
7340  for (l = view->window_children; l && l->data; l = g_list_next (l)) {
7341  EvViewWindowChild *child;
7342 
7343  child = (EvViewWindowChild *)l->data;
7344 
7345  ev_view_window_child_move (view, child, child->x + dx, child->y + dy);
7346  }
7347 
7348  if (view->pending_resize) {
7349  gtk_widget_queue_draw (widget);
7350  } else {
7351  gdk_window_scroll (gtk_widget_get_window (widget), dx, dy);
7352  }
7353 
7354  ev_document_misc_get_pointer_position (widget, &x, &y);
7355  ev_view_handle_cursor_over_xy (view, x, y);
7356 
7357  if (view->document)
7358  view_update_range_and_current_page (view);
7359 }

1998 {
1999  const gchar *name = ev_link_action_get_name (action);
2000 
2001  if (g_ascii_strcasecmp (name, "FirstPage") == 0) {
2002  return g_strdup (_("Go to first page"));
2003  } else if (g_ascii_strcasecmp (name, "PrevPage") == 0) {
2004  return g_strdup (_("Go to previous page"));
2005  } else if (g_ascii_strcasecmp (name, "NextPage") == 0) {
2006  return g_strdup (_("Go to next page"));
2007  } else if (g_ascii_strcasecmp (name, "LastPage") == 0) {
2008  return g_strdup (_("Go to last page"));
2009  } else if (g_ascii_strcasecmp (name, "GoToPage") == 0) {
2010  return g_strdup (_("Go to page"));
2011  } else if (g_ascii_strcasecmp (name, "Find") == 0) {
2012  return g_strdup (_("Find"));
2013  }
2014 
2015  return NULL;
2016 }

static char * tip_from_link ( EvView *  view,
EvLink *  link 
)
static

Definition at line 2019 of file ev-view.c.

2020 {
2021  EvLinkAction *action;
2022  EvLinkActionType type;
2023  char *msg = NULL;
2024  char *page_label;
2025  const char *title;
2026 
2027  action = ev_link_get_action (link);
2028  title = ev_link_get_title (link);
2029 
2030  if (!action)
2031  return title ? g_strdup (title) : NULL;
2032 
2033  type = ev_link_action_get_action_type (action);
2034 
2035  switch (type) {
2036  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_GOTO_DEST:
2037  page_label = ev_document_links_get_dest_page_label (EV_DOCUMENT_LINKS (view->document),
2038  ev_link_action_get_dest (action));
2039  if (page_label) {
2040  msg = g_strdup_printf (_("Go to page %s"), page_label);
2041  g_free (page_label);
2042  }
2043  break;
2044  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_GOTO_REMOTE:
2045  if (title) {
2046  msg = g_strdup_printf (_("Go to %s on file %s"), title,
2047  ev_link_action_get_filename (action));
2048  } else {
2049  msg = g_strdup_printf (_("Go to file %s"),
2050  ev_link_action_get_filename (action));
2051  }
2052  break;
2053  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_EXTERNAL_URI:
2054  msg = g_strdup (ev_link_action_get_uri (action));
2055  break;
2056  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_LAUNCH:
2057  msg = g_strdup_printf (_("Launch %s"),
2058  ev_link_action_get_filename (action));
2059  break;
2060  case EV_LINK_ACTION_TYPE_NAMED:
2061  msg = tip_from_action_named (action);
2062  break;
2063  default:
2064  if (title)
2065  msg = g_strdup (title);
2066  break;
2067  }
2068 
2069  return msg;
2070 }

static void update_can_zoom ( EvView *  view)
static

Definition at line 7593 of file ev-view.c.

7594 {
7595  gdouble min_scale;
7596  gdouble max_scale;
7597  gboolean can_zoom_in;
7598  gboolean can_zoom_out;
7599 
7600  min_scale = ev_document_model_get_min_scale (view->model);
7601  max_scale = ev_document_model_get_max_scale (view->model);
7602 
7603  can_zoom_in = (view->scale * ZOOM_IN_FACTOR) <= max_scale;
7604  can_zoom_out = (view->scale * ZOOM_OUT_FACTOR) > min_scale;
7605 
7606  if (can_zoom_in != view->can_zoom_in) {
7607  view->can_zoom_in = can_zoom_in;
7608  g_object_notify (G_OBJECT (view), "can-zoom-in");
7609  }
7610 
7611  if (can_zoom_out != view->can_zoom_out) {
7612  view->can_zoom_out = can_zoom_out;
7613  g_object_notify (G_OBJECT (view), "can-zoom-out");
7614  }
7615 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static void view_update_range_and_current_page ( EvView *  view)
static

Definition at line 685 of file ev-view.c.

686 {
687  gint start = view->start_page;
688  gint end = view->end_page;
689  gboolean odd_left;
690 
691  if (ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document) <= 0 ||
692  !ev_document_check_dimensions (view->document))
693  return;
694 
695  if (view->continuous) {
696  GdkRectangle current_area, unused, page_area;
697  GtkBorder border;
698  gboolean found = FALSE;
699  gint area_max = -1, area;
700  gint best_current_page = -1;
701  int i, j = 0;
702 
703  if (!(view->vadjustment && view->hadjustment))
704  return;
705 
706  current_area.x = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->hadjustment);
707  current_area.width = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->hadjustment);
708  current_area.y = gtk_adjustment_get_value (view->vadjustment);
709  current_area.height = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (view->vadjustment);
710 
711  for (i = 0; i < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document); i++) {
712 
713  ev_view_get_page_extents (view, i, &page_area, &border);
714 
715  if (gdk_rectangle_intersect (&current_area, &page_area, &unused)) {
716  area = unused.width * unused.height;
717 
718  if (!found) {
719  area_max = area;
720  view->start_page = i;
721  found = TRUE;
722  best_current_page = i;
723  }
724  if (area > area_max) {
725  best_current_page = (area == area_max) ? MIN (i, best_current_page) : i;
726  area_max = area;
727  }
728 
729  view->end_page = i;
730  j = 0;
731  } else if (found && view->current_page <= view->end_page) {
732  if (is_dual_page (view, NULL) && j < 1) {
733  /* In dual mode we stop searching
734  * after two consecutive non-visible pages.
735  */
736  j++;
737  continue;
738  }
739  break;
740  }
741  }
742 
743  if (view->pending_scroll == SCROLL_TO_KEEP_POSITION ||
744  view->pending_scroll == SCROLL_TO_FIND_LOCATION) {
745  best_current_page = MAX (best_current_page, view->start_page);
746 
747  if (best_current_page >= 0 && view->current_page != best_current_page) {
748  view->current_page = best_current_page;
749  ev_view_set_loading (view, FALSE);
750  ev_document_model_set_page (view->model, best_current_page);
751  }
752  }
753  } else if (is_dual_page (view, &odd_left)) {
754  if (view->current_page % 2 == !odd_left) {
755  view->start_page = view->current_page;
756  if (view->current_page + 1 < ev_document_get_n_pages (view->document))
757  view->end_page = view->start_page + 1;
758  else
759  view->end_page = view->start_page;
760  } else {
761  if (view->current_page < 1)
762  view->start_page = view->current_page;
763  else
764  view->start_page = view->current_page - 1;
765  view->end_page = view->current_page;
766  }
767  } else {
768  view->start_page = view->current_page;
769  view->end_page = view->current_page;
770  }
771 
772  if (view->start_page == -1 || view->end_page == -1)
773  return;
774 
775  if (start != view->start_page || end != view->end_page) {
776  gint i;
777 
778  for (i = start; i < view->start_page && start != -1; i++) {
779  hide_annotation_windows (view, i);
780  }
781 
782  for (i = end; i > view->end_page && end != -1; i--) {
783  hide_annotation_windows (view, i);
784  }
785 
786  ev_view_check_cursor_blink (view);
787  }
788 
789  ev_page_cache_set_page_range (view->page_cache,
790  view->start_page,
791  view->end_page);
792  ev_pixbuf_cache_set_page_range (view->pixbuf_cache,
793  view->start_page,
794  view->end_page,
795  view->selection_info.selections);
796  if (view->accessible)
797  ev_view_accessible_set_page_range (EV_VIEW_ACCESSIBLE (view->accessible),
798  view->start_page,
799  view->end_page);
800 
801  if (ev_pixbuf_cache_get_surface (view->pixbuf_cache, view->current_page))
802  gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (view));
803 }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

6591  gdouble width, height;
6592  gdouble max_scale;
6593  gdouble dpi;
6594  gint rotation;
6595  GdkScreen *screen;
6596 
6597  if (!view->document)
6598  return;
6599 
6600  rotation = ev_document_model_get_rotation (view->model);
6601  screen = gtk_widget_get_screen (GTK_WIDGET (view));
6602  dpi = ev_document_misc_get_screen_dpi (screen) / 72.0;
6603 
6604  ev_document_get_min_page_size (view->document, &min_width, &min_height);
6605  width = (rotation == 0 || rotation == 180) ? min_width : min_height;
6606  height = (rotation == 0 || rotation == 180) ? min_height : min_width;
6607  max_scale = sqrt (view->pixbuf_cache_size / (width * dpi * 4 * height * dpi));
6608 
6609  ev_document_model_set_min_scale (view->model, MIN_SCALE * dpi);
6610  ev_document_model_set_max_scale (view->model, max_scale * dpi);
6611 }

7884

7895  }
